name: Pro Basketball
shortDesc: Official size and weight basketball for indoor and outdoor play.
longDesc: Durable composite leather basketball designed for indoor and outdoor courts. Features excellent grip, high bounce, and consistent flight. Suitable for all skill levels.

name: Soccer Ball Elite
shortDesc: FIFA-approved soccer ball with premium stitching.
longDesc: Premium stitched soccer ball for professional and casual play. Water-resistant, durable, and optimized for control and precision. Perfect for training and competitive matches.

name: Tennis Racket Pro 3000
shortDesc: Lightweight racket with advanced tension technology.
longDesc: High-performance tennis racket with carbon frame for power and precision. Lightweight for faster swings and reduced arm fatigue. Suitable for intermediate and advanced players.

name: Yoga Mat Comfort Plus
shortDesc: Non-slip, cushioned yoga mat for all exercises.
longDesc: Eco-friendly TPE yoga mat with extra cushioning and non-slip surface. Lightweight, portable, and perfect for yoga, pilates, and stretching exercises.

name: Running Shoes SpeedX
shortDesc: Breathable running shoes with excellent cushioning.
longDesc: Lightweight running shoes with breathable mesh, shock-absorbing soles, and ergonomic design. Ideal for jogging, marathons, and daily workouts.

name: Gym Dumbbell Set
shortDesc: Adjustable dumbbell set for strength training.
longDesc: Versatile dumbbell set with adjustable weights for progressive strength training. Ergonomic handles for safe, comfortable grip. Ideal for home gyms.

name: Fitness Resistance Bands
shortDesc: Set of 5 resistance bands with varying tension levels.
longDesc: High-quality latex resistance bands for strength, flexibility, and rehab exercises. Color-coded for multiple tension levels. Lightweight and portable.

name: Cycling Helmet Aero
longDesc: Aero helmet combining safety, comfort, and aerodynamics. Adjustable straps and padded lining ensure a secure fit. Ideal for road and mountain cycling.

name: Boxing Gloves Pro
shortDesc: Durable gloves with extra padding for protection.
longDesc: High-quality leather boxing gloves with reinforced padding for impact protection. Comfortable fit for training, sparring, and competitive boxing.

name: Golf Club Set
shortDesc: Complete set with driver, irons, and putter.
longDesc: Complete golf club set for beginners and intermediate players. High-quality steel shafts, ergonomic grips, and balanced club heads for accurate swings.

name: Nike Mercurial Superfly 8
shortDesc: Lightweight football boots with excellent traction and control.
longDesc: Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 football boots designed for speed and precision. Flyknit upper for a snug fit, textured surface for ball control, and a responsive soleplate for explosive acceleration. Perfect for professional and amateur players.

name: Table Tennis Set
shortDesc: Complete table tennis set with paddles and balls.
longDesc: Durable table tennis set including two paddles, three balls, and a net. Perfect for beginners and advanced players. Lightweight and portable for easy setup.
